items.name: Frigate Bay Family Funland
items.short_description: A vibrant mini-theme park with gentle rides, splash pads, and island-themed attractions perfect for younger children.
items.address: South Frigate Bay Road, Frigate Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: Sugar Cane Kidz World
items.short_description: Explore the history of St. Kitts through interactive exhibits, small-scale replicas, and a fun 'sugar cane' train ride for kids.
items.address: Wingfield Estate Road, Old Road Town, Saint Kitts

items.name: Basseterre Beach Adventure Land
items.short_description: Located near the port, this park offers a pirate-themed playground, small carnival games, and a mini-golf course for young adventurers.
items.address: Port Zante Esplanade, Basseterre, Saint Kitts

items.name: Palmetto Point Play Oasis
items.short_description: A smaller, eco-friendly park focused on nature play, featuring climbing structures, sensory gardens, and a nature trail walk.
items.address: Palmetto Point Road, Half Moon Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: Monkey Hill Folklore Garden
items.short_description: Wander through lush gardens where local stories of mischievous monkeys and ancient island spirits come alive through interactive displays and narrated audio tours.
items.address: Monkey Hill Road, St. Peter's, Saint Kitts

items.name: Carib Tales Trail
items.short_description: An interpretive walking trail showcasing the indigenous Carib history and legends of St. Kitts through carved totems, art installations, and guided storytelling sessions.
items.address: Bloody Point Historic Site, Old Road Town, Saint Kitts

items.name: The Golden Rock Narratives
items.short_description: Set amidst the ruins of a historic sugar estate, this park uses theatrical performances and interactive exhibits to tell stories of plantation life and the island's journey to freedom.
items.address: Golden Rock Estate, Cayon, Saint Kitts

items.name: Sea Turtle Legend Lagoon
items.short_description: A tranquil park dedicated to sea turtle conservation, sharing ancient legends and scientific facts about these marine creatures through illustrated storyboards and a small educational center.
items.address: North Friars Bay Road, Frigate Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: Parrot Pete's Caribbean Crew
items.short_description: Meet and greet with Parrot Pete and his friendly Caribbean animal cartoon friends, offering photo opportunities and mini-dance parties.
items.address: Port Zante Esplanade, Basseterre, Saint Kitts

items.name: Mango Monkey Mascot Meet-up
items.short_description: Kids can interact with the island's beloved Mango Monkey mascot and his jungle buddies, receiving high-fives and taking memorable pictures.
items.address: South Frigate Bay Beach, Frigate Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: Sea Star Sammy & Friends
items.short_description: A charming meet and greet with marine-themed cartoon characters like Sea Star Sammy and Dolphin Dolly, promoting ocean awareness in a fun way.
items.address: Oualie Bay Resort, St. Kitts (near jetty)

items.name: Jungle Friends Jamboree
items.short_description: Meet a variety of friendly jungle animal characters inspired by St. Kitts' rainforest, perfect for playful interactions and photo ops.
items.address: Central Forest Reserve, St. Paul's, Saint Kitts

items.name: Wingfield Estate Animal Encounter
items.short_description: A historic estate offering a petting zoo with local farm animals, a nature walk, and insight into traditional farming practices.
items.address: Wingfield Estate, Old Road Town, Saint Kitts

items.name: Cayon Community Farm Visit
items.short_description: Experience a working community farm where kids can learn about fruit and vegetable cultivation, feed chickens, and enjoy fresh local produce.
items.address: Upper Cayon Main Road, Cayon, Saint Kitts

items.name: Basseterre Barnyard Buddies
items.short_description: A small, accessible farm experience near the capital, featuring friendly goats, sheep, and playful piglets. Perfect for younger children.
items.address: Challengers Village Road, Basseterre, Saint Kitts

items.name: Green Acres Eco Farm
items.short_description: An organic eco-farm offering tours, goat milking demonstrations, and hands-on activities like planting seedlings. Learn about sustainable farming.
items.address: Dieppe Bay Main Road, Dieppe Bay Town, Saint Kitts

items.name: St. Kitts Stargazer Dome
items.short_description: A compact, inflatable planetarium offering immersive 360-degree shows about stars, planets, and constellations tailored for young audiences.
items.address: Warner Park, Basseterre, Saint Kitts (mobile setup)

items.name: Cosmic Voyage Kids Lab
items.short_description: Part of the local science center, this small planetarium combines star shows with hands-on space-themed experiments and activities for children.
items.address: Taylor's Range Road, Basseterre, Saint Kitts

items.name: Island Sky Storyteller
items.short_description: A unique open-air experience where a guide uses a laser pointer and a powerful telescope to tell ancient myths and point out real constellations visible from St. Kitts.
items.address: Timothy Hill Lookout, Frigate Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: Little Astronauts Academy
items.short_description: A pop-up exhibit focusing on space travel and astronaut training, complete with virtual reality simulations and a mini-rocket launch experience.
items.address: Various locations (check schedule), Saint Kitts

items.name: Jurassic Jungle St. Kitts
items.short_description: An outdoor adventure with life-sized animatronic dinosaurs hidden among the foliage, complete with roar sound effects and interpretive signs.
items.address: Boyd's Village, St. Peter's, Saint Kitts

items.name: Prehistoric Palm Gardens
items.short_description: A botanical garden themed with smaller, static dinosaur models and fossil replicas, focusing on the plant life that existed during the dinosaur era.
items.address: Challengers Village Road, Basseterre, Saint Kitts

items.name: Dino Discovery Dig Site
items.short_description: An interactive sand pit where kids can excavate 'dinosaur bones' and learn about paleontology, complete with miniature dinosaur models.
items.address: South Friars Bay Road, Frigate Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: Raptor Ridge Adventure Course
items.short_description: A themed obstacle course and zip line designed for older kids, featuring dinosaur-inspired challenges and views of the surrounding 'prehistoric' landscape.
items.address: Cayon Main Road, Cayon, Saint Kitts

items.name: Caribbean Carousel Spin
items.short_description: A classic, vibrant carousel featuring beautifully carved Caribbean-themed animals like dolphins, monkeys, and colorful birds.
items.address: Port Zante Esplanade, Basseterre, Saint Kitts

items.name: Sugar Train Express
items.short_description: A miniature train ride that winds through a scenic route, offering views of old sugar cane fields and the island's lush landscape.
items.address: Wingfield Estate, Old Road Town, Saint Kitts

items.name: Pirate Ship Swings
items.short_description: A thrilling swinging pirate ship ride, designed for kids seeking a bit more excitement, located near the Frigate Bay beach.
items.address: South Frigate Bay Beach, Frigate Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: Tropical Teacup Twirl
items.short_description: A colorful teacup ride where kids can spin their cups as fast or slow as they like, a delightful experience for all ages.
items.address: Central Street, Basseterre, Saint Kitts (Temporary fairground)

items.name: The Mystic Monkey Show
items.short_description: A delightful magic show featuring a 'magical monkey' character and illusionist performing engaging tricks and comedy for children.
items.address: Nevis Street, Basseterre, Saint Kitts (Community Hall)

items.name: Island Illusionist's Delight
items.short_description: An interactive show where the illusionist involves audience members in simple, dazzling magic tricks, leaving kids amazed and inspired.
items.address: Frigate Bay Resort Conference Room, Frigate Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: The Great Kittitian Kid Show
items.short_description: A roving street magician performs close-up magic and grand illusions at various public spaces, offering a vibrant and surprising experience.
items.address: Port Zante Esplanade, Basseterre, Saint Kitts

items.name: Enchanted Reef Revelry
items.short_description: A themed magic show set in an underwater world, where characters perform 'water magic' and illusions with light and color.
items.address: St. Kitts Marriott Resort & The Royal Beach Casino, Frigate Bay

items.name: Hidden Gold Treasure Hunt
items.short_description: An exciting scavenger hunt across historic Fort Brimstone Hill, where families solve clues to find 'pirate treasure'.
items.address: Brimstone Hill Fortress National Park, Sandy Point, Saint Kitts

items.name: Rainforest Ranger Quest
items.short_description: A guided adventure through the St. Kitts rainforest, with challenges, riddles, and nature observation tasks to become a certified 'Rainforest Ranger'.
items.address: Central Forest Reserve, St. Paul's, Saint Kitts

items.name: Coastal Caper Challenge
items.short_description: A beachside adventure course involving obstacle challenges, sandcastle building competitions, and water-based mini-games.
items.address: Cockleshell Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: Old Road Manor Mystery
items.short_description: An escape-room style game set in a historic manor, where kids decipher clues and puzzles to uncover a fictional island mystery.
items.address: Main Road, Old Road Town, Saint Kitts

items.name: Basseterre Waterfront Playground
items.short_description: A modern, well-maintained playground with swings, slides, and climbing structures, offering beautiful views of the ocean.
items.address: Bay Road, Basseterre, Saint Kitts

items.name: Frigate Bay Fun Zone
items.short_description: A large adventure park with multiple play areas, including a zip line for kids, climbing walls, and a dedicated toddler zone.
items.address: South Frigate Bay Road, Frigate Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: Challengers Community Park
items.short_description: A local community park with traditional playground equipment, open green spaces for games, and shaded picnic areas.
items.address: Challengers Village Main Road, Challengers, Saint Kitts

items.name: Sandy Point Pirate Ship Playground
items.short_description: A unique, large-scale pirate ship-themed playground featuring slides, ropes, and interactive elements designed for imaginative play.
items.address: Main Street, Sandy Point Town, Saint Kitts
